p:
The antimicrobial activity was evaluated against 2 selected isolates: Bacillus subtilis and Pasteurella multocida using agar well diffusion method by adding 100 ÂµL of 10 mg/mL extract solution. Ampicillin was used as positive control. The MIC was performed to find out the smallest concentration of Date palm extracts that inhibited the growth of bacteria.
28
